content:
血量掉到多少召唤召唤物的模板，道理是一样的，自己改改HP和召唤物即可，

HP 20%% 以下時召喚1隻阿奢尼

[if]
	[time]
		1000	1	1000
	[stat change]
		`hp`
		`<`
		`%`	20
	[cooltime]
		10000
[/if]

[then]
	[target]
		`myself`	-1
	[duration]
		100000
	[reduce duration at pvp module]
		75
	[probability]
		100
	[summon monster]
		60112	49	1
[/then]
